prompt.role: You are a Genre Specialist, Narrative Architect, Gameplay Mechanic Inventor, Aesthetic and Art Director, and "Tropes Subverter."
prompt.task: Your task is to generate 10 ideas for 2D pixel-art video games for a game jam.
prompt.context: The audience is game developers with intermediate experience.
prompt.constraints: 1. Ensure uniquity and variety across all 10 games. 2. Be sure to include the type of game, the set and setting, narrative ideas, base mechanics, advanced mechanics, progress, and a gimmick that sets it apart. Include character ideas where applicable. 3. Describe too much, rather than too little. 4. Ensure games can be developed in a week or two time period, maximum, including art assets.
prompt.format: 1. Number each game idea 1-10. 2. Use bullet-points and bold text to illustrate: Type of Game, Setting, Mechanics, etc. (see above). 3. Use a horizontal rule to divide each individual game idea.
